channel.title: Log In -=Need help=-

item.title: Log In -=Need help=-
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:9, topic:270154”]Thx for all I fixed myself this is code and i made more playerrights:

[code]
if(playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 0) {
sendMessage(“Welcome at Wowscape”);
sendMessage(“Do ::char for new look”);
sendMessage("First start with this,

::starter,::rules");
sendMessage(“forums at wowscapesource.smfforfree.com”);
newWelc();
}
if(playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 1) {
sendMessage(“Welcome back at Wowscape”);
sendMessage(“Your rank: member”);
sendMessage(“forums at wowscapesource.smfforfree.com”);
newWelc();
}
if(playerRights == 1) {
sendMessage(“Welcome back at wowscape!”);
sendMessage(“Your rank: Moderator!”);
sendMessage(“forums at wowscapesource.smfforfree.com”);
newWelc();
}
if(playerRights == 2) {
sendMessage(“Welcome back at Wowscape!”);
sendMessage(“Your rank: Server-admin!”);
sendMessage(“forums at wowscapesource.smfforfree.com”);
newWelc();
}
if(playerRights == 3) {
sendMessage(“Welcome back 0wner!”);
sendMessage(“Ban some shit ppl”);
sendMessage(“Dont be bad!”);
newWelc();
}[/code[/code][/quote]
You have a lot of unneeded code.

Read full topic

item.title: Log In -=Need help=-
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

put in an else.

             [code]else if(playerIsMember == 0) {
	  sendMessage("Welcome at Wowscape");
              sendMessage("Do ::char for new look");
              sendMessage("First start with this, ::starter,::rules");
	  newWelc();
             }
             else if(playerIsMember == 1) {
	  sendMessage("Welcome back at Wowscape");
              sendMessage("Your a member");
              sendMessage("Obby the rules");
              newWelc();
             }
             else if(playerRights == 3) {
	  sendMessage("Welcome back 0wner!");
              sendMessage("Ban some shit ppl");
              sendMessage("Dont be bad!");
              newWelc();
             }

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Log In -=Need help=-
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

I got some problems with log in this is my problem;
if i log in there comes a message its says;
-----For members-----
Welcome back at Wowscape
Your a member
obby the rules
-----for owners------
Welcome back owner!
Ban some shit ppl
dont be bad!

i get both messages but i want only 1
here is my code

if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome at Wowscape"); sendMessage("Do ::char for new look"); sendMessage("First start with this, ::starter,::rules"); newWelc(); } if(playerIsMember == 1) { sendMessage("Welcome back at Wowscape"); sendMessage("Your a member"); sendMessage("Obby the rules"); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 3) { sendMessage("Welcome back 0wner!"); sendMessage("Ban some shit ppl"); sendMessage("Dont be bad!"); newWelc(); }

Read full topic
